text: In the dream, fascinated by the nightmare, I saw myself raising my dagger over the object of my crime. For a moment, the only moment that could change my design and with it my destiny and that of another being, my freedom and his death, his life or my slavery, the nightmare was frustrated and I was awake. Seeing me raise the dagger over the object of my crime, I realized that it was not a dream to decide again between his life or my freedom, between his death or my slavery. I closed my eyes and struck the blow. Am I imprisoned for my crime or a victim of a dream? FIN
title: ¿Por qué?
author: Edmundo Valadés
